name: Allies in War
description:
Take command of a powerful modern army and conquer your enemies in Allies in War, a military real-time strategy combat game! Build up your base, upgrade buildings and defenses, and crush the enemy bases to teach them to fear your alliance. Donate to unlock new buildings, and help your friends defeat Bosses in epic fights.

To win the war collect bonus items from challenging single player missions and epic co-operative battles. Form Alliances with friends and other players, and fight in weekly tournaments for big rewards. Learn how to use your troops, traps, and defenses to earn medals, take resources from other players, and dominate on the battlefield!

Features:

-Free-to-play MMO military real-time strategy combat game
-Build up your base for defense and train a powerful army
-Single player campaign for practice and earning resources
-Attack opponents and loot their materials
-Defend against incoming assaults and vengeful enemies
-Deploy troops from APCs and use Engineers to clear traps
-Form an Alliance with friends and other players
-Lead and structure your Alliance with advanced rank controls
-Fight in Epic Battles in cooperation with your Alliance
-Collect Bonus Items from single player campaign and epic co-op battles
-Use Items to customize your Headquarters Bunker for your style of play
-Donate to friends to unlock special buildings

Fun. Simple to use. Addictive. Social. Combat.

The world is erupting in conflict, enemies are coming for your riches, and the only thing between them and you losing everything are you and your Allies in War.

If you wish to get more news on Allies in War, follow us on our facebook page: facebook.com/AlliesInWar
